briefdescription.para: Shift bits depending on byte order in system.

detaileddescription.para:
Fun fact: __BYTE_ORDER is wrong on Solaris Sparc, but the version without __ is correct.

is an offset last byte

briefdescription.para: Write specified value into bit array.

Assumes value < (1 << length) and length <= 57. Assumes the memory is zero initially.

briefdescription.para: Fills mask for certain int range according to provided max value.

briefdescription.para: Computes amount of bits required ti store integers upto value provided.

simplesect.para: amount of bits required to store integers from range with maximum provided
